languages.text: {n}Измененное тело, созданное для битвы, способно вынести тяжелейшие повреждения. Оно умирает долго и неохотно, растягивая муки Ахиллеаса на еще одну вечность боли. Но подходит к концу и она.{/n}

{n}The augmented body was built for battle and can endure plenty of punishment. It dies slowly and reluctantly, stretching Achilleas's suffering into another eternity of pain. But just like all things, it too comes to an end.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Измененное тело, созданное для битвы, способно вынести тяжелейшие повреждения. Оно умирает долго и неохотно, растягивая муки Ахиллеаса на еще одну вечность боли. Но подходит к концу и она.{/n}

traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: {n}The augmented body was built for battle and can endure plenty of punishment. It dies slowly and reluctantly, stretching Achilleas's suffering into another eternity of pain. But just like all things, it too comes to an end.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: {n}The augmented body was built for battle and can endure plenty of punishment. It dies slowly and reluctantly, stretching Achilleas's suffering into another eternity of pain. But just like all things, it too comes to an end.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}増強された肉体は戦いのために作られたもので、多くの痛みに耐えることができる。アキレアスの苦しみを永遠の苦しみへと引き延ばしながら、ゆっくりと不本意な死へと導く。しかし万物と同じように、それもまた終わりを迎える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The augmented body was built for battle and can endure plenty of punishment. It dies slowly and reluctantly, stretching Achilleas's suffering into another eternity of pain. But just like all things, it too comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}増強された肉体は戦いのために作られたもので、多くの痛みに耐えることができる。アキレアスの苦しみを永遠の苦しみへと引き延ばしながら、ゆっくりと不本意な死へと導く。しかし万物と同じように、それもまた終わりを迎える。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}这具经过强化的身体本是为了战斗而生，可以承受极重的伤势。怪物的躯体慢慢失去了生机，将阿吉里亚斯临死前的痛苦漫无止境地延长下去。不过，就像所有的事情一样，他的痛苦也终将会结束。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The augmented body was built for battle and can endure plenty of punishment. It dies slowly and reluctantly, stretching Achilleas's suffering into another eternity of pain. But just like all things, it too comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这具经过强化的身体本是为了战斗而生，可以承受极重的伤势。怪物的躯体慢慢失去了生机，将阿吉里亚斯临死前的痛苦漫无止境地延长下去。不过，就像所有的事情一样，他的痛苦也终将会结束。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Su cuerpo aumentado fue construido para la batalla y puede soportar grandes daños. Muere lentamente y resistiéndose, alargando el sufrimiento de Achilleas a otra eternidad de dolor. Pero, como todas las cosas, también llega a su fin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The augmented body was built for battle and can endure plenty of punishment. It dies slowly and reluctantly, stretching Achilleas's suffering into another eternity of pain. But just like all things, it too comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su cuerpo aumentado fue construido para la batalla y puede soportar grandes daños. Muere lentamente y resistiéndose, alargando el sufrimiento de Achilleas a otra eternidad de dolor. Pero, como todas las cosas, también llega a su fin.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Der augmentierte Körper wurde für die Schlacht erschaffen und kann viel einstecken. Er stirbt langsam und zögerlich, verlängert Achilleas' Leid zu einer weiteren Ewigkeit der Schmerzen. Doch wie alle Dinge endet auch das.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The augmented body was built for battle and can endure plenty of punishment. It dies slowly and reluctantly, stretching Achilleas's suffering into another eternity of pain. But just like all things, it too comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der augmentierte Körper wurde für die Schlacht erschaffen und kann viel einstecken. Er stirbt langsam und zögerlich, verlängert Achilleas' Leid zu einer weiteren Ewigkeit der Schmerzen. Doch wie alle Dinge endet auch das.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Conçu pour le combat, le corps augmenté est capable de supporter les pires tourments. Il meurt lentement, presque à contrecœur, plongeant Achilleas dans une nouvelle éternité de souffrance. Mais comme toute chose, il finit par s'éteindre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The augmented body was built for battle and can endure plenty of punishment. It dies slowly and reluctantly, stretching Achilleas's suffering into another eternity of pain. But just like all things, it too comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Conçu pour le combat, le corps augmenté est capable de supporter les pires tourments. Il meurt lentement, presque à contrecœur, plongeant Achilleas dans une nouvelle éternité de souffrance. Mais comme toute chose, il finit par s'éteindre.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Çatışmalar için tasarlanan, ogmentli beden; işkenceye epey dayanıklı. Ölümün yavaş ve zoraki gelişi, Achilleas'ın çektiği acıları çile dolu bir sonsuzluğa döndürüyor. Fakat her şey gibi bu da bir noktada sona eriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The augmented body was built for battle and can endure plenty of punishment. It dies slowly and reluctantly, stretching Achilleas's suffering into another eternity of pain. But just like all things, it too comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ogmentli beden, çatışmalara uygun kılındığından cezalandırmaya karşı oldukça dayanıklı. Yavaş ve zoraki gelen ölüm, Achilleas'ın çektiği acıları çile dolu bir sonsuzluğa döndürüyor. Fakat her şey gibi o da bir noktada sona eriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant
